tasks.text: Streamlined web development workflow by migrating from class to function components in React for a hotel's frontend team.
Enhanced data integration by creating efficient API response adapters, contributing to seamless user experiences for the hotel's web plattform.
Drove documentation efforts, ensuring clear guidelines and knowledge sharing for the frontend team at the web development team of the hotel.
Highly qualified Freelance Web Developer, with almost 2 years of professional expertise
Proficient in Fullstack web development, and count with a strong portfolio showcasing successful projects across diverse industries.
Constantly developing new features for an argentinian unicorn Startup.
In company of a team, we developed a higly demanded API with PHP and Laravel for the web app of servicioAlToque.
Close relations with the client and the rest of the team

Efficiently supported daily operations and collaborated with legal professionals to ensure a smooth workflow and timely execution of tasks, while facilitating document management in the law firm of my father, Dr. Juan Pablo Corvalán.
Completing the templates for lawsuits with customer’s data.
Receiving and presenting official documentation in court.
Control and classification of legal evidence.
Performing technical support tasks in the IT area.
